Package com.fssa.librarymanagement.validation

Class BookValidator

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.librarymanagement.validation.BookValidator
public class BookValidator extends Object
This class provides Validations for all Book data.
Author:
KishorMuruganandham

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    BookValidator()
    Constructs a BookValidator instance without a specific book.

    Constructs a BookValidator instance with a specific book to validate.

  • Constructor Details

    • BookValidator

      public BookValidator (Book book)
      Constructs a BookValidator instance with a specific book to validate.
      Parameters:
      book - The Book object to be validated.

    • BookValidator

      public BookValidator()
      Constructs a BookValidator instance without a specific book. This constructor can be used when validating books with individual validation methods.

  • Method Details

    • validateAll

      public void validateAll() throws ValidationException
      Validates all Book attributes.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If any validation fails

    • validateTitle

      public boolean validateTitle (String title) throws ValidationException
      Validates the book title.
      Parameters:
      title - The title to validate
      Returns:
      true if the title is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If the title is empty

    • validateAuthor

      public boolean validateAuthor (String author) throws ValidationException
      Validates the book author.
      Parameters:
      author - The author to validate
      Returns:
      true if author is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If author is empty

      public boolean validateCoverImage (String coverImage) throws ValidationException
      Validates a profile image URL.
      Parameters:
      coverImage - The profile image URL to validate
      Returns:
      true if profile image URL is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If profile image URL is empty or invalid

    • validateTotalCopies

      public boolean validateTotalCopies (int totalCopies) throws ValidationException
      Validates the total number of copies.
      Parameters:
      totalCopies - The total copies to validate
      Returns:
      true if total copies are valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If total copies is non-positive

    • validateAvailableCopies

      public boolean validateAvailableCopies (int availableCopies, int totalCopies) throws ValidationException
      Validates the number of available copies.
      Parameters:
      availableCopies - The available copies to validate
      totalCopies - The total copies for comparison
      Returns:
      true if available copies is valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If available copies is negative or exceeds total copies

    • validateLoanedCopies

      public boolean validateLoanedCopies (int loanedCopies, int totalCopies) throws ValidationException
      Validates the number of loaned copies.
      Parameters:
      loanedCopies - The loaned copies to validate
      totalCopies - The total copies for comparison
      Returns:
      true if loaned copies are valid
      Throws:
      ValidationException - If loaned, copies are negative or exceed total copies
